game.name: Frontier Ferris For Adventurers
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, RPG, 시뮬레이션
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: This game is a real-time battle action game. Winning battles in an area earns experience and skill points. You can grow stronger by leveling up and acquiring skills from the skill tree. You can earn money by selling items and treasures obtained in battles and by completing requests.
